titleStmt.title: A list of the names of all the proprietors in the Bank of England March 18. 1698. Note, those marked **** are capable, by their stock, of being chosen governour, deputy-governour, or directors: *** deputy-governour or directors: ** directors: * have a vote, and no person more than one vote. At the ensuing election to be made; of governour and deputy-governour, on Tuesday the 28th. and of directors on Friday the 31st day of this month. Together with an abstract of the by-law concerning elections, for the better direction of members in giving their votes.
Lists. 1698-03-18.
titleStmt.author: Bank of England.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Guildhall Library, London.
